page.title: 07CLUBS
page.content: The entertainment in Castleford is very good.We found this out by asking 49 families in a school.This is a list of clubs and how many people from our list attend:discos 31,brownies & guides 15,cubs & scouts 9,Working mens'clubs 8,first aid 4,karate 3,swimming 2,motorbikes,snooker & Castleford Young Musicians were all 1. W.M.C. have an average of 100 members,karate 15,discos 80,brownies & guides 16,cubs & scouts 16,swimming 60 members.There are 6 clubs for people over 18.For people at 14 there is only 1,Y.M.C.A.,other than those for children.For people over 12 there are 3 discos,Jimmy's,Kiosk,Centre X1.For younger people under 12 there is first aid,karate,cubs & scouts,brownies & guides and Castleford Young Musicians.
